Polar FT1 Heart Rate Monitor
For the first steps in heart rate-based workouts
MORE DETAILED
  • You will hear a sound notification about the desired heart rate during training;
  • You will see an informative graphical indicator of the target training zones of the pulse;
  • You will also see information about the calorie consumption per workout;
  • You will be able to view data on 10 training sessions.

customer reviews
Irina Ivanchenko
2 half marathons
I didn't know that I was a Buy - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that fit exactly my goals and financial capabilities. After a while, I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation, I turned to the same place.

New goals - a new gadget!

Thank you, RunSmart!
Иван Сёмочкин
1 half marathon
Cool thing-a heart rate monitor. I usually ran without them. It turns out that he only made it worse for himself. I bought a heart rate monitor and got a workout as a gift. Together with me, they conducted the first training session, taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan for the month ahead.

With them, I prepared for my first half marathon! Thanks!!!
Yulia Dashkina
2 half marathons
For a long time I could not start running, because I had started several times before, but it became difficult and I quit. From friends I heard about RunSmart and about running with heart rate control and decided to try it.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and picked up a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! I have already run 2 half-marathons and several shorter races and I do not intend to stop!

Thanks!!!
Moscow, Myasnitsky proezd, 3s1
